title: Experts predict year-end crypto crash, yet wonder what crypto to buy now for 1500% ROI
description: Investors and experts are both paying close attention to the volatile market as the last few months of 2025 draw to a close. title: Gold allure beats crypto: Given a choice between bitcoin and bullion - only one offers security, says ALEX BRUMMER
description: The stalemate in Washington over debt limits, which has shutdown the American government, means several G7 rich countries are in a stew.
